name: Mohamad Nachawati
heroContent: I am a passionate full-stack developer with a knack for crafting robust and scalable web applications. I have honed my skills in front-end technologies like React and Angular and back-end technologies like ASP.NET Core, Node.js, MySQL, PostgreSQL, and DynamoDB. I aim to leverage my expertise to create innovative solutions that drive business growth and deliver exceptional user experiences.
aboutMeContent: I was born in Damascus, Syria. I started my academic journey by graduating with a diploma as an Agricultural Engineering Assistant in 2003. Following that, I spent six years working as an accountant, honing my skills in numbers and organization. However, the war in Syria forced me to leave my homeland, and I eventually moved to Finland in 2017, after spending some time in Turkey. In Finland, I embraced a fresh start, learning the Finnish language and diving into a new field that has always intrigued me: technology. I pursued my passion by studying Information and Communications Technology at LAB University of Applied Sciences in Lahti, Finland, and successfully graduated as a Software Engineer in late 2023. Since childhood, I’ve been fascinated by the latest tech trends and have always had a thirst for learning and self-development. Now, I’m channeling that passion into building innovative solutions and contributing to the world of software engineering.
aboutMeImageAltText: Professional photo of Mohamad Nachawati, passionate full-stack developer focused on creating scalable web applications.

experiences.description: I developed new features, including localization, while resolving various bugs to enhance the application's functionality and user experience. Working closely with the R&D department, I actively participated in implementing Agile methodologies, collaborating with and learning from experienced professionals to deliver high-quality solutions. Throughout this process, I leveraged various technologies, including TypeScript, Node.js, Angular, Serverless architecture, and AWS services, to drive innovation and optimize performance.

I Organized supplier and customer accounts, prepared accounting reports and managed the general budget, which fostered my skills in accounting, logical thinking, and problem-solving. Gained hands-on experience with office computer programs and accounting software.

projects.title: Live Data Visualization
projects.description: Provides a live data visualization of energy information in Finland, specifically focusing on wind power generation, electricity production, and consumption.

projects.title: Budget React App
projects.description: A personal finance management application built using React and TypeScript. The application is designed to help users manage their incomes, expenses, savings, and set financial goals efficiently.

projects.title: Full stack E-commerce
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce application with React and Redux for the frontend, and ASP.NET Core 8 for the backend. The goal is to provide a seamless shopping experience for users, along with a robust management system for administrators.
